summary: This is an internal email from June 12, 2023, regarding an update on a referral concerning Leon Black. The sender relays information to attorney Jeanne Christensen, notes deconfliction with the District Attorney of New York (DANY), and attaches notes from conversations and email correspondence.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The email is an update regarding an 'Additional HT Subject Referral' concerning Leon Black, indicating he is the subject of a human trafficking investigation or inquiry.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: The sender relays information to Jeanne Christensen, an attorney, and attaches notes from conversations with her. She is the counsel involved in the referral concerning Leon Black.

connections.description: Jeanne Christensen is acting as counsel in a matter concerning Leon Black, as indicated by the referral and attached conversation notes.

events.title: Update call with Jeanne Christensen
events.description: The sender had a conversation with attorney Jeanne Christensen to relay information, specifically about deconfliction with DANY regarding a minor victim.

events.title: Initial referral call concerning Leon Black

keyFacts: The document is an internal email update dated June 12, 2023, concerning a human trafficking subject referral related to Leon Black.
The investigation involves coordination or 'deconfliction' with the District Attorney of New York (DANY) regarding a minor victim.
Attorney Jeanne Christensen is the counsel of record involved in the matter, with attached notes from calls on May 26, 2023, and June 12, 2023.
